contest-event.event-date:
July 8, 1933 D Fairford Contest (Section 2)
Fairford Contest (Section 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Fairford Contest fairford-contest-section-2
None
Fairford, Gloucestershire, England, UK Open to bands who had not won cash prizes exceeding £13 since January 1931
Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, 3rd £5, 4th £3. 10 bands competed.
Another newspaper report gives the result as: 1. Reading Spring Gardens, 2. Brynmawr, 3. Poulton......
Sept. 16, 2013, 10:13 a.m. Jan. 21, 2014, 6:16 p.m.
1 Staffordshire Band E. T. Smith
2 Paulton Silver R. W. Kingman
3 Bletchington Silver Band William Uzzell
4 Brynmawr D. J. Stevens
